title: Directions: Locations (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Locations subcategory within Directions. Includes 5 card(s).

cards.english: There is a convenience store on the right side.
cards.japanese: 右にコンビニがあります。

cards.english: There is a post office on this street.
cards.romaji: Kono tori ni yubinkyoku ga arimasu.
cards.japanese: この通りに郵便局があります。

cards.english: There is a good ramen shop to the left of the convenience store.
cards.romaji: Konbini no hidari ni oishii ramen-ya ga arimasu.
cards.japanese: コンビニの左においしいラーメン屋があります。

cards.english: There is a big bookstore in front of the bank.
cards.romaji: Ginko no mae ni okii hon-ya ga aru.
cards.japanese: 銀行の前に大きい本屋がある。

cards.english: There's a Bank of Japan in Nihonbashi.
cards.japanese: 日本橋に日本銀行があります。
